name: Squire (Hisham Nashef, Kale_Eos, Irene Shea)
description:
Dreaming of becoming a Knight one day only gets you so far. Play as a Squire assigned to an incompetent Knight with little of his former glory left remaining as you attempt to prove your worth and compensate for the Knight’s difficult nature.

Behold! The Knights of Team All Knighter! 

Hisham Nashef- Project Lead, Artist, Level Design, Music/Sound Design

Irene Shea - Project Lead, Narrative Design, Artist, Level Design (Proposed the game idea) 

Paco Ellaga - Programmer, Level Design, Music/Sound Design

Cong-Ly Duong - Narrative Design, Artist

Weston Elliott-  Narrative Design, Level Design, Programmer 

Stephen Long- Narrative Design, Level Design, Programmer
